Package org.waarp.ftp.client

Main class for the FTP Client for R66.

See:
          Description


Class Summary
DataTimeOutListener Timeout listener for Data connection for FTP4J model
NullOutputStream Simple /dev/null output stream
Version Provides the version information of Waarp OpenR66.
WaarpFtp4jClient FTP client using FTP4J model (working in all modes)
WaarpFtpClient FTP Client using Apache Commons net FTP client (not working using FTPS or FTPSE)
 

Package org.waarp.ftp.client Description

Main class for the FTP Client for R66.

Author:
"Frederic Bregier"
